description: A comprehensive mobile news application focused on technology news, providing users with curated tech articles, real-time updates, and personalized content discovery. The app offers a seamless reading experience with article bookmarking, category filtering, and social sharing capabilities.

targetUsers.description: Software developers, engineers, and IT professionals who need to stay updated with industry trends
Technology lovers who enjoy following gadget reviews, startup news, and innovation stories
CTOs, managers, and executives who need tech insights for business decisions

coreFeatures.name: Article Feed
coreFeatures.description: Curated feed of technology news articles from multiple sources

coreFeatures.name: Category-based Discovery
coreFeatures.description: Browse articles by technology categories (AI, Mobile, Web, Startups, etc.)

coreFeatures.name: Article Bookmarking
coreFeatures.description: Save articles for later reading with offline access

coreFeatures.name: Article Detail View
coreFeatures.description: Full article reading experience with rich formatting and images

coreFeatures.name: Social Sharing
coreFeatures.description: Share articles via social media, email, or messaging apps

coreFeatures.name: Search Functionality
coreFeatures.description: Search articles by keywords, topics, or authors

coreFeatures.name: Push Notifications
coreFeatures.description: Breaking news alerts and personalized content recommendations

coreFeatures.name: Dark Mode Support
coreFeatures.description: Toggle between light and dark themes for comfortable reading

coreFeatures.name: Reading Progress
coreFeatures.description: Track reading progress and reading time estimates

coreFeatures.name: Offline Reading
coreFeatures.description: Download articles for offline reading when no internet connection

userStories.story: As a tech professional, I want to browse the latest technology news so that I can stay updated with industry trends and developments.
As a tech professional, I want to filter articles by specific categories (AI, Cloud, Security) so that I can focus on topics relevant to my work.
As a tech enthusiast, I want to bookmark interesting articles so that I can read them later when I have more time.
As a tech enthusiast, I want to share compelling articles with my network so that I can discuss them with colleagues and friends.
As a business decision maker, I want to search for articles about specific technologies so that I can research solutions for my company.
As a tech professional, I want to receive push notifications for breaking tech news so that I can stay informed about critical industry developments.
As a tech enthusiast, I want to switch to dark mode so that I can read comfortably in low-light environments.
As a business decision maker, I want to see my reading progress so that I can manage my time effectively when consuming content.
As a tech professional, I want to download articles for offline reading so that I can catch up on news during my commute without internet access.

criteria: Display at least 20 articles on initial load
Implement infinite scroll for loading more articles
Show article thumbnail, title, source, and publication date
Load time should be under 3 seconds
Handle network errors gracefully with retry options
Display at least 8 technology categories
Filter articles by selected category within 2 seconds
Show article count for each category
Allow multiple category selection
Persist category preferences across app sessions
Bookmark/unbookmark articles with single tap
Store bookmarks securely on device
Display bookmarked articles in dedicated section
Sync bookmarks across user devices (if logged in)
Support offline access to bookmarked articles
Display full article content with proper formatting
Support images, videos, and embedded content
Provide readable font sizes and line spacing
Include article metadata (author, date, reading time)
Load article content within 2 seconds
Support sharing to major platforms (Twitter, LinkedIn, WhatsApp)
Include article title and link in shared content
Open native sharing dialog within 1 second
Handle sharing failures gracefully
Track sharing analytics for popular content

constraints.description: Must support iOS 14+ and Android API level 24+
constraints.impact: Limits use of newest platform features

constraints.description: Built with React Native and Expo for cross-platform compatibility
constraints.impact: May require platform-specific optimizations for performance

constraints.description: Must work offline for bookmarked content
constraints.impact: Requires local storage and content caching implementation

constraints.description: MVP must be completed within 8-10 weeks
constraints.impact: Prioritize must-have features, defer nice-to-have features

constraints.description: Depends on third-party news APIs for content
constraints.impact: Must handle API rate limits and potential service outages

constraints.description: Must comply with content attribution and fair use policies
constraints.impact: Requires proper source attribution and potential content licensing

constraints.description: App size should not exceed 50MB for optimal download experience
constraints.impact: Optimize images and implement lazy loading for content

successMetrics.measurement: Analytics tracking of unique daily app opens

successMetrics.target: 40% retention rate at 7 days, 20% at 30 days
successMetrics.measurement: Cohort analysis of user return behavior

successMetrics.target: Average of 3 articles read per user session
successMetrics.measurement: Track article view completions and session duration

successMetrics.target: 30% of users bookmark at least 1 article per week
successMetrics.measurement: Track bookmark creation and usage patterns

successMetrics.target: 4.2+ stars on both iOS App Store and Google Play Store
successMetrics.measurement: Monitor store ratings and user reviews
Track time spent in app per session

successMetrics.target: 15% of articles viewed are shared by users
successMetrics.measurement: Track share button usage and completion rates

successMetrics.target: App launch time under 3 seconds, crash rate below 1%
successMetrics.measurement: Performance monitoring and crash reporting tools
